package.name: Happy Chick
package.shortDescription: Happy Chick Emulator is a totally free emulator, which supports PSP/ NDS/ N64/ PS1/ WS/ Arcade (CPS1, CPS2, CPS3, IGS)/ GBA/ GBC/ MD/ SFC(SNES), and PS game consoles. With this emulator installed, you have the very access to a library of thousands of console games in wide genres.

descriptionlist.description: Happy Chick Emulator is a totally free emulator, which supports PSP/ NDS/ N64/ PS1/ WS/ Arcade (CPS1, CPS2, CPS3, IGS)/ GBA/ GBC/ MD/ SFC(SNES), and PS game consoles. With this emulator installed, you have the very access to a library of thousands of console games in wide genres.

You can also have
a multi-line item.
